name: One night in the house (Demo)
description:
Story: You moved to a new place in hope to have a great new life but you moved to the neighbourhood that has a rumour about monsters attacking people at night. You don't believe that at first but when you heard a noise coming from outside, you have noticed now that the rumours are true.

Credits:

Kendall Weaver - Urban Night Skybox

Ferocious Industries - Suburban Structure Kit

LowlyPoly - Stylized Grass Texture

Pxltiger - Zombie model

Witch-A-Twin Studios - Scarecrow model

Tons Of Hun Studios - Low Poly Bathroom Pack

OneProgram's - Small Pack Furniture

VIS Games - Clock

Kobra Game Studios - Bed collection

Little Robot Sound Factory - Horror Sfx

Helix Studio - Chibi Mummy
